cards.name: Blood Harvest

rulings.text: If a land enters the battlefield tapped, Blood Harvest won't trigger.

cards.name: Charitable Wisdom
cards.originalText: Target opponent chooses a number, then you and that player may each search one of your libraries for a permanent card and reveal them. Put each permanent card with mana value less than or equal to the chosen number onto the battlefield under their owner's control, the rest into their owners' hands, then each player who searched their library this way shuffles it.

rulings.text: Each player will search one of their own libraries of their choice. No one will be able to search an opponent's library, and the caster isn't able to force the opponent to search an additional library.

cards.name: The Witch Queens
cards.originalText:
[+2]: The Witch Queens deal 2 damage to each of up to two targets.
[-3]: Gain control of target land and untap it.
[-9]: Each player discards their hand, then draws up to seven cards. The Witch Queens deal damage to each opponent equal to twice the number of cards that player has drawn this turn.

cards.flavor:
“The cursed spirits never seem to learn; even without a hearth I'm never without fire.”
— Fessi, Witch of the Lady

cards.flavor: Visiting yearly at the behest of the Lady and Lord, they perform the Tale of Spring nightly until the final moon of the festival.
